ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var bookid = baseUrl.match(/novel\/(\d+)/)[1];
//ä¹¦è¯„å‘é€
const bookva = book.getVariable("custom");
if (bookva != false && bookva !== "" && source.getLoginHeader()) {
 const commenturl = `${GetUL()}/home/comment/add.html`;
 let body = `content=${bookva}&type=novel&mid=${bookid}`
 try {
 let code = String(java.getVerificationCode(`data:image/svg+xml;base64,${codesvg}`));
 if (code == "è¯„è®º" || /^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
//java.log(code);
if (/^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
	 let contid = code.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
 body += `&pid=${contid}`
}
//java.log(body);
 let headers = {
 "x-requested-with": "XMLHttpRequest"
 }
 let ok = java.post(commenturl, body, headers).body();
 java.toast(JSON.parse(ok).msg);
 book.putCustomVariable("");
 } else {
 	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(40);
 	java.toast('è¯·æŒ‰å›¾ç‰‡è¦æ±‚å¡«å†™');
 	book.putCustomVariable("");
 	}
 } catch(err) {
 	java.log(err);
 	book.putCustomVariable("");
 	}
 } else if(bookva != false && bookva !== "" && !source.getLoginHeader()) {
	java.toast("æœªç™»å½•ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•åæ“ä½œ");
	book.putCustomVariable("");
}

try{
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['ä¹¦ç±ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = /^https?/.test($('[property$=image]@content')) ? $('[property$=image]@content') : GetUL() + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {
	 "ID": bookid,
 "img": img,
 "name": $('[property$=book_name]@content'),
 "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
 "info": $('[property$=description]@content').slice(0,45),
 "url": "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src=" + baseUrl
 }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {
	java.log("ç™»å½•UIæœªåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¿å­˜æ•°æ®ï¼š"+err);
	}
src;
</js>

"a":"[property$=author]@content",
"t":"class.fix@p.2:3@text##.*[ï¼š:]",
"k":"class.tg@span@text##\n##,",
"i":"[property$=image]@content",

ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

exploreUrl:
<js>
var result = []
var push = (title, url, size) => result.push({
 title: title,
 url: url,
 style: {
 layout_flexGrow: 1,
 layout_flexBasisPercent: size
 }
})
var tg = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://mangguoshufang.com/0/list/1.html')).select('.x-category__box:nth-of-type(1) a');

tg.forEach(tag => {
	 var nam = tag.text()
	 ul = String(tag.attr('href')).replace("1.html","{{page}}.html");
 push(nam,ul,0.25);
});

JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (src.includes('Just a moment...')) { 
	 cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl);
 cf = java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl,'éªŒè¯',false).body();
} else {
	cf = src;
	}
	cf;
</js>
.x-book

searchUrl:
<js>
var url = source.getKey();
java.webView(null ,url,null );
var co = cookie.getCookie(url);
var urls = url+'/search.html,';
var dj = {
 "body": "searchkey={{key}}",
 "method": "POST",
 "Cookie":co
}
var post = JSON.stringify(dj);
var so = urls+ post;
so;
</js>

<js>
sckey = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(source.key + "search")).select(".page-search").attr("data-id");
java.log(sckey);
body = {
 "body": `name=${key}&tags=&type=3&tt=&page_index=${page}&app=2&searchkey=${sckey}`,
 "headers":{"Referer":source.key},
 "method": "POST"
}
result = source.key + "api/search/list" + "," + JSON.stringify(body);
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
 var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
 var txt = java.getString("#txt@html",ml);
 java.longToast("æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºwebViewåŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½ã€‚");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
 // éå†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é˜…è¯»å†…ç½®Base64è§£ç æ–¹æ³•
 var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
 var txtt = String(bsej);
 result.push(txtt);
 }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>
